scripts.test:backend: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm backend python -m pytest
scripts.test:unit: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm backend python -m pytest ./tests/unit
scripts.test:integration: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm backend python -m pytest ./tests/integration
scripts.test:frontend: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm frontend sh -c 'npm install && npx vitest --reporter verbose'
